\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	{\mathbf{mod}_{R^{\mathrm{op}}}} & {\mathbf{add}(R)} && {(\mathrm{cok}(f)_R,-)_R} \\
	{-\otimes _RR^m} & {_RR^m} & {R^m_R} & {(R^m_R,-)_R} \\
	{-\otimes _RR^n} & {_RR^n} & {R^n_R} & {(R^n_R, -)_R} \\
	{-\otimes_R\mathrm{cok}(f)} && {\mathbf{add}(R)} & {(\mathbf{mod}_R)^{\mathrm{op}}}
	\arrow["{+\varinjlim^{<\infty}}"', tail, from=1-2, to=1-1]
	\arrow["{f_!}"', from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["f", from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-4, to=1-4]
	\arrow[two heads, from=3-1, to=4-1]
	\arrow["{f^{\mathrm{op}}}", from=3-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{f^\ast}"', from=3-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{+\varinjlim^{<\infty}}", tail, from=4-3, to=4-4]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
